title: Understanding the “Agent” in Agentic AI: A Game-Changer for QA Teams
excerpt: Discover how agent-based automation in QA improves resilience, reduces maintenance, and handles UI changes without relying on scripts or DOM.
content:
This post focuses not on comparing Agentic AI to traditional tools (which we’ve done here) but on clarifying what an "agent" truly is and how QA managers and engineers can practically use it to streamline testing workflows.
